meanings.definition: To communicate or send a message using a radio.
meanings.sent1: She was radioing for help after getting lost in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The pilot was radioing the control tower to request permission for landing.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was radioing to its friends about the abundance of acorns in the park.
meanings.sent4: The flowers seemed to be radioing their beauty to all who passed by.
meanings.sent5: The detective was radioing updates to the team during the investigation.

meanings.definition: The act of transmitting or receiving messages via radio waves.
meanings.sent1: The radioing of distress signals helped the stranded hikers get rescued.
meanings.sent2: The radioing of news updates kept the community informed during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The radioing of music from the station made the long drive more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The radioing of instructions guided the ships safely through the fog.
meanings.sent5: The radioing of emergency alerts warned residents of the approaching tornado.
